mapper.select: SELECT id, vehicle_type as vehicleType,vehicle_desc as vehicleDesc, iu_prefix as iuPrefix, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime, hour_charge as hourCharge, tax_rate as taxRate FROM vehicle_charge_class
SELECT id, PlateNo as deviceIU, PlateNo2 as vehicleNo,BeginDate as effectiveDate , EndDate as expiredDate, CreateDate as createDatetime, ChangeTime as updateDatetime FROM carissueinfo
